name: Pyro (RyanSPeterson)
description:
Pyro is a game about strategically burning down trees. Use burning barrels to ignite a chain reaction of fire through the forest. Right now the game is just about wanton destruction but I would like to expand the idea make it an educational game about fire prevention and controlled burning.

Use left click to place a barrel, right click to delete it, and space to set it off. Burn down ten trees to gain back two barrels. Try to burn down as many trees as you can.
